sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>Migrate open_nlu_driver_language.dialog_acts_supported</description>
        <name>Migrate dialog_acts_supported</name>
        <record_for_rollback>true</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[// Set dialog_acts_supported to FALSE for ALL open_nlu_driver_language records
var gr = new GlideRecord("open_nlu_driver_language");
gr.initialize();
gr.setValue("dialog_acts_supported", false);
gr.setWorkflow(false);
gr.updateMultiple();

// Set dialog_acts_supported to TRUE for the "Service Now NLU record for English" record
gr = new GlideRecord("open_nlu_driver_language");
gr.initialize();
gr.get("297e8c635b2200101f254d3ba881c707");
gr.setValue("dialog_acts_supported", true);
gr.setWorkflow(false);
gr.update();]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2023-01-25 16:34:23</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>a20532e2eb606110c27601c7c15228d9</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>Migrate dialog_acts_supported</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Proxy agent for connecting to Natural Language Understanding (NLU) providers" source="com.glide.nlu.proxy">5e8db8203c75311068bcf327dfe37f62</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_a20532e2eb606110c27601c7c15228d9</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2023-01-25 16:34:23</sys_updated_on>
        <unloadable>false</unloadable>
    </sys_script_fix>
</record_update>
